headline: NJOY Continues To Drive Altria Group’s (MO) Sustained Growth
summary: Following a strong earnings report, Altria Group, Inc.’s stock price hit a 52-week high at $55.09. The company’s NJOY shipments grew by 15%, proving the acquisition last year was a great strategic move. With a proven history of dividend increases and strategic capital allocation, the company continues to be a key player in the evolving […]

headline: Altria: The Unexpected Tailwind Of An RFK Jr. Nomination
summary: RFK Jr.'s appointment as HHS Secretary could impact Altria Group's (MO) shares and may lead to positive outcomes despite industry challenges. Read more here.
